bike.description: NEW Fuji Altair 2 custom butted aluminum with PoweCurve down tube, Tri shaped top tube, Oversized seat tube and Integrated head tube, double water bottle mounts. Rear triangle: Fuji Altair 2 custom butted aluminum with Edge S-bend MonoStay, Cold forged dropout with CNC D disc mount and replaceable hanger
